com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.renderer
Class NativeRenderer<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.renderer.NativeRenderer<T>

public class NativeRenderer<T>
extends java.lang.Object

Bridge renderer that translates rendering instructions from RhizosphereRenderer instances into a native jsni renderer that the Rhizosphere javascript library can understand. Also translates events and method calls arising from jsni into GWT land.

RhizosphereRenderer instances are free to use GWT widgets in the output they produce. To ensure that these widgets are properly managed according to GWT widget lifecycle expectations, this class must hold references to the containing Rhizosphere visualization (itself a widget) in the form of a WidgetBridge (for lifecycle events such as attaching and detaching) and a ModelExtractor (for conversion between Rhizosphere models defined in GWT land and their Javascript equivalents).

Since renderers can also be defined via Rhizosphere configuration options (both for the plain Rhizosphere visualization and the Google Visualization compatible GVizRhizosphere), it becomes mandatory not to share configuration options between different Rhizosphere instances (enforced throughout the library).

This class is for internal use. Users of the Rhizosphere library should not bother with this one.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Constructor Detail

NativeRenderer

public NativeRenderer(RhizosphereRenderer<T> gwtRenderer,
                      WidgetBridge widgetBridge,
                      ModelExtractor<T> extractor)
Creates a new renderer.

Parameters:
gwtRenderer - The GWT-land renderer to bridge and expose to the underlying javascript Rhizosphere library.
widgetBridge - A widget bridge to ensure correct handling of GWT widgets shared between GWT and jsni code. Can be null and lazily defined at a later state.
extractor - A model extractor to recover Rhizosphere models from their JavaScriptObject wrappers. Can be null and lazily defined at a later state.
Method Detail

setWidgetBridge

public void setWidgetBridge(WidgetBridge bridge)
Lazily defines the widget bridge. The widget bridge can be set only once, so this method will throw an exception if the bridge was already set on the constructor or on a previous call to this method.

Parameters:
bridge - The widget bridge.
Throws:
RhizosphereException - if a bridge is already defined for this renderer.

setModelExtractor

public void setModelExtractor(ModelExtractor<T> extractor)
Lazily defines the model extractor. The model extractor can be set only once, so this method will throw an exception if the extractor was already set on the constructor or on a previous call to this method.

Parameters:
extractor - The model extractor.
Throws:
RhizosphereException - if an extractor is already defined for this renderer.

toJavaScriptObject

public com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject toJavaScriptObject()
Converts the renderer this class was instantiated with into a jsni equivalent renderer that translates rendering instructions bidirectionally between GWT rendering code and the underlying Rhizosphere javascript rendering infrastructure.

Returns:
A native javascript renderer.

delegateRender

public java.lang.Object delegateRender(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jso,
                                       boolean expanded,
                                       com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jsoRenderingHints)
Delegates a rendering request originated from the underlying Rhizosphere javascript library to the GWT renderer managed by this class.

Parameters:
jso - A JavaScriptObject wrapping the Rhizosphere model affected by the rendering request.
expanded - Whether the rendering should be in expanded (maximized) status or not.
jsoRenderingHints - Rendering hints about the current visualization environment.
Returns:
an HTML element containing the produced rendering.

delegateAttach

public void delegateAttach(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jso,
                           boolean attached)
The rendering associated to the given model has been physically attached to or detached from the DOM.

Parameters:
jso - A JavaScriptObject wrapping the Rhizosphere model affected by this attach notification.
attached - Whether the rendering was attached to the DOM or detached from it.

delegateExpandable

public boolean delegateExpandable(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jsoRenderingHints)
Queries the GWT renderer managed by this class to determine whether it supports expansion (maximization) of model renderings or not.

Parameters:
jsoRenderingHints - Rendering hints about the current visualization environment.
Returns:
Whether the renderings produced by the GWT renderer support expansion (maximization) or not.

delegateExpandableByModel

public boolean delegateExpandableByModel(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jso,
                                         com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jsoRenderingHints)
Queries the GWT renderer managed by this class to determine whether it supports expansion (maximization) of model renderings on a model-by-model basis.

Parameters:
jso - A JavaScriptObject wrapping the Rhizosphere model whose expandable capability is to be determined.
jsoRenderingHints - Rendering hints about the current visualization environment.
Returns:
Whether the rendering produced for the requested model supports expansion or not.

delegateCacheDimensions

public boolean delegateCacheDimensions()
Queries the GWT renderer managed by this class to determine whether the dimensions of the produced renderings can be cached or not.

Returns:
Whether the dimensions of the produced renderings can be cached or not.

delegateCanRescaleTo

public boolean delegateCanRescaleTo(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jso,
                                    int width,
                                    int height)
Queries the GWT renderer managed by this class to determine whether a model rendering can be rescaled to given dimensions.

Parameters:
jso - A JavaScriptObject wrapping the Rhizosphere model whose rescaling is to be determined.
width - The desired width after rescaling.
height - The desired height after rescaling.
Returns:
Whether rescaling to the desired dimensions is possible.

delegateRescale

public void delegateRescale(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jso,
                            int width,
                            int height)
Asks the GWT renderer managed by this class to rescale a model rendering.

Parameters:
jso - A JavaScriptObject wrapping the Rhizosphere model whose rescaling is to be performed.
width - The desired width after rescaling.
height - The desired height after rescaling.

delegateChangeStyle

public void delegateChangeStyle(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jso,
                                com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject props,
                                boolean revert)
Asks the GWT renderer managed by this class to perform style changes to a model rendering.

Parameters:
jso - A JavaScriptObject wrapping the Rhizosphere model whose associated rendering should be restyled.
props - A key-value map of the style properties to set.
revert - Whether this set of changes reverts the model rendering to its original style or not.

delegateGetSizeRange

public com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject delegateGetSizeRange()
Asks the GWT renderer managed by this class to return a size range for legend purposes.

Returns:
the size range.

public com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject delegateGetColorRange()
Asks the GWT renderer managed by this class to return a color range for legend purposes.

Returns:
the color range.
